Skills.title: HTLM5
Skills.understanding: It was my first time learning html and i didnt know what to do but as time passed by, I gotten way better at using it.

Skills.title: CSS3
Skills.understanding: I find that styling is quite hard for me but i'm still learning to improve myself into mastering it.

Skills.title: Github
Skills.understanding: I've gotten a hand with deploying, retrieving and editing my own work, cant wait to collab with people to help work on there projects.

Skills.title: Bootstrap
Skills.understanding: Using bootstrap makes my work little easier and im able to work at a faster rate with more time for me to be coding.

Skills.title: JavaScript
Skills.understanding: I found this very interesting, learning to use different methods to work with, im still polishing my knowledge more since there will be new things that i can learn.

Skills.title: Vue.js
Skills.Understanding: vue is quite new to me, and its not like the other modules, but with practice ill pull through.

Education.description: I am currently studying coding at Life Choice Academy
I went to university to study Biotechnology and dropped out
I went to go learn at iStudent Academy and gotten a certificate for I.T Engineering 1 day workshop
I matriculated from high school with a bachelor pass
My homeroom teacher rewarded me with certificates for working hard every term
During the start of my High School, I attended a Numeric Math Programme and was giving multiple certificates
During Primary School i was given a chess player certificate

Testimonials.name: Codi Kader
Testimonials.statement: Masood Basardien, He is a very determined, passionate and kind young man. He is going to do great things in the IT sector. You can count on that. Masood strives his best to make sure that all his deadlines & work is done as soon as possible and correctly as possible. He works really well in a group or alone. He is able to adapt in any environment he is placed in. Once you get to know him you feel a sense of belonging as he is able to welcome you in with a warm and kind atmosphere. This is a great addition to any workplace or business.

Testimonials.name: Mogammad Imtiyaaz Damon
Testimonials.statement: Masood is a kind person with a great sense of humour. He is a great friend and he is very intelligent.

Testimonials.name: Uzukhanye Dywili
Testimonials.statement: Working with Masood Basardien was an incredible experience. Their professionalism, attention to detail, and communication skills made the entire process seamless. They consistently exceeded my expectations and delivered exceptional results. I would highly recommend Masood Basardien to anyone looking for a talented and dedicated professional.

Testimonials.name: Taflynne Summer Petersen
Testimonials.statement: Masood Basardien is a good person to work with, he thinks for himself and ask help when needed only. He is good at putting two and two together , works well in a group setting and very helpful. He is an asset to any company or field he persues.

Testimonials.name: Eighton Lee Paulse
Testimonials.statement: Masood Basardien is a very positive individual. He often tries his best to help with work and does his part in everything the way he needs to do. He is very reliable and friendly and works well in groups. My experience working with him was great. I would definitely recommend him.

Testimonials.name: Joel Mukanya
Testimonials.statement: Masood is very well-behaved, social, and dedicated; he enjoys working with his peers and works well on his project. He learned HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and VueJS. He will learn more in the coming months.
